messages.content: I am writing to warn you about Conservative plans to hit pensioners with a triple whammy if they win this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luke Pollard pledges to protect the Triple Lock, keep all Winter Fuel Allowance, continue free bus passes, and establish a National Care Service.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2015, the Tories won here by just 523 votes. This election will be close again.

issues.health: Labour will introduce a 'Dementia Tax' that will force people to sell their family homes to pay for social care.

leaflet.personalStatement: "Plymouth is my home. It's where I was born and where I live. We need a strong local MP who will stand up for us. I will always put Plymouth first."

contactInformation.address: Lockyer Hall, Alfred Street, Plymouth PL1 2RP

images.caption: Luke Pollard in a city environment

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. Watch a video I've recorded about the Tory Dementia Tax at lukepollard.org
